text: Can't say I'm surprised by this move. Google's journey from "Don't be evil" to "Just a little evil" was as natural as their journey from a search engine to a global tech empire. 🤷‍♂️
At least they're being honest about it now, right? 😅
The first step is admitting you have a problem... in this case, embracing the dark side.
Next up: Google announces their new HQ on the Death Star. 🚀
So, does this mean they'll be rebranding Google Assistant to "Evil Assistant"?
I can see it now: "OK Google, play Despacito." "I'm sorry, I can only play the Imperial March." 🎶
"OK Google, navigate to the nearest coffee shop." "I'm sorry, I can only navigate to the dark side." ☕
Is it just me or has anyone else noticed a sudden increase in the number of terminators wandering around their neighborhood? 🤖
I've seen a few, but I just assumed they were the new mail delivery bots from Amazon. 📦
Actually, that's not a bad idea. Amazon should partner with Skynet to improve their delivery times.
I'm waiting for Google's next announcement: "Don't be evil, just make a profit." 💰
Pretty sure that's been their unofficial motto for years now. 💸
Google - taking the "just a little evil" approach to maximizing shareholder value since 1998. 📈
